website_summaries.verdict: Versatile digital ballast that allows for using multiple wattages of bulbs, while also including dimmable options.
pros: Includes extra protection against potential power surges to ensure proper operation over time
Has a timer, so you can program it to run automatically

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!! Buyer beware!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this ballast in March 2019, and it's dead already, the store that sold it is gone now, and Amazon Denied my claim since it's 1 month after the 3 month A to Z, the ballast will not fire bulbs, I have rebuilt 2 hoods, changed bulbs, even took my entire light set up to a local store to have it tested, the ballast is bad, gives an open shirt error, and if it only fire Double ended bulbs now then why was it sold in March as firing single and double ended bulbs!!!! Says right on the ballast Se/De. I have no light now and am ordering a Vivosun ballast today....don't waste your time and money.

Next ballast I buy, will probably be the same.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful ballast.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful ballast...top notch product. Runs cool and the bulbs are definitely brighter than my previous generic ballast. Anti-hot start technology is a nice assurance that the ballast will only strike bulbs if cooled sufficiently. The only reason I did not give it 5 stars is that the internal timer is unreliable. Loss of power or power fluctuation causes ballast to reset timer so it won't turn back on again. Not ideal! I do not understand why Solis Tek designed it this way. Good news is there is a simple fix for this. If you buy this ballast, be sure to also buy an external timer that is compatible with electronic ballasts (which not all are).
